title: Loving Hut - Cincinnati
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Operating since Mar 2009 previously as Loving Cafe, this is now part of the international chain of Loving Hut restaurants. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Offers vegan cuisine with a kids' menu plus smoothies, gluten free and raw options. The cafe environment was created using many found, reclaimed, and reused materials.
